settings.heading: Track Your Symptoms
settings.description: Record your symptoms and receive a printable chart to monitor your progress and share with your healthcare professional.

settings.notice_text: This symptom tracker is not a diagnostic tool. It is designed to help you learn about and consider if you may be experiencing menopause, and to monitor your ongoing response to treatments. If you feel you are experiencing symptoms of menopause, please consult a healthcare professional.
settings.info_text: The symptom tracker quiz is being developed. Once complete, you'll be able to:
